p.e:
Your main structural build block is the
platform. it poses as such, aswell as
being a brige, wall and ramp too.
the only thing important to note is
that, when not lying on the ground
both rods have to be anchored to
something in order to mount the
panel. This means that bridges
longer than 1 panel without a wall
to clamp to require struts in order
to remain their structural integrity.
said type of bridge can't be built
using heavy amor panels.
Any other panel can be used like normal

TRIGGER TO RETURN

b: when told building then become untweened 2
when triggered then become untweened 1
when starts then become next in 8s
when starts then become 1 in 8s

p.e:
The goal of the united nexus federation
is to unite all synthetic liveforms in
the semi-singularity in order to
ensure peacefull and prosper coexistance
and preventing possible future wars.
Those unsolvable incompatible or
fanaticly unwilling will be disarmed
with all force necessary in order to
eliminate the potential threat their
nonconformity poses to peace.

TRIGGER TO RETURN

b: when told general then become untweened 2
when triggered then become untweened previous
when touched then tell general

p.e:
The uniqe mechanics introduced with
this faction are armor, energy and radio
range. Armor is explained under "combat"
Radio range defines if you can control
drones and drone carriers have a
deifned limit on how many can be moved
during one turn. Energy comes in 2
different types, production and charge.
Power plants have a specific energy
production while certain buildings need
a specific energy upkeep to function wich
is subtracted from the total production
of the grid. chargers, cells and converters
draw energy production in order to form
energy charges wich can be used for
specific actions on some buildings or
as a ressource for specialized units.

TRIGGER TO RETURN

b: when told mechanics then become untweened next
when triggered then become untweened previous
when triggered then become untweened next
when touches hand then tell sel
when told sel then become untweened previous
when touches hand then tell combat

p.e:
For logistics there are transport
vehicles and conduits.
conduits can be assembled on
the field by any builder but only
buildings can partake in the
network, so be sure to send them
off with enough ressources on hand
or supply them using transporters.

If there is one thing the UNF
doesn't lack in it's land air and
sea transports in all sizes for all
purposes, but be sure about what
you are getting since some vehicles
are for cagro or personel transport only

TRIGGER TO RETURN

b: when told logistics then become untweened 2
when triggered then become untweened 1

p.e:
Some vehicles have firing arc and relative
armor thicknes indicators.
Red means all incoming damage is halved while
yellow means this only applies when the
raw damage wouldn't kill the vehicle instantly.

Vehicles that come with turnrate and
reverse or strafe speed clarifications
have to follow them.
Air vehicles with the exeption of the
Draco XV have to remain level.

Units with multiple weapon systems can
conduct multiple attacks within their
attack phase wich however
unless stated otherwise doesn't grant
them any additional attack phases.
